document.full_text: the 2011 atlantic hurricane season will be "above normal", spawning six to 10 hurricanes of which around half could become major, the government's weather agency forecast on thursday.
document.title: atlantic hurricane season "above normal": noaa
lines_and_colors: the 2011 atlantic hurricane season will be "above normal", spawning six to 10 hurricanes of which around half could become major, the government's weather agency forecast on thursday.
